entry.title: Kitchen Synthesizer
entry.content: This guy made a synthesizer out of household kitchen dishware like bowls, plates, and pans with leftover electronic equipment. Wow.

entry.title: Bienvenue
entry.content:
After about six months, countless designs, and head-desking, I’ve finally created a (functioning) design that I actually like. It’s running on a modifed version of Octopress that allows me to tumblelog.

I’ve decided against importing my old Tumblr posts. Mainly because Tumblr’s API is dumb (it uses XML with inconsistent tags!), but also because I want to start fresh. There are a lot of really terrible, non-informative posts there.

The code for this site and the theme are on Github. The theme is under the MIT License, so you’re free to do whatever you wish with it.

I may or may not add comments to this site. In the meantime, feel free to talk to me on Twitter as @ethnt.
